title: Commemorative T-Shirts for sale featuring 1887 Detroit Wolverines!!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Commemorative T-Shirts for sale featuring 1887 Detroit Wolverines!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim McAllister
Actual photo of the 1887 World Champion Detroit Wolverines
are featured on the back, and a photo of the ballpark they played in, Recreation Park, is featured on the front of this high quality, 100% cotton, white t-shirt.  They have never been worn or washed, and except for a couple of wrinkles, are in mint condition.  Available in size M,L,XL, and XXL. Price:  $10.00, including shipping.  Also available (in size M or L only) are commemorative 1895 Temple Cup Champion Clevelans Spiders T-shirts, featuring actual photo of the Spiders on front.  This team was lead by Cy Young, and the shirt also has a facsimile autograph of Young on front.  Price:  $10.00, including shipping.

posts.post_title: Commemorative T-Shirts for sale featuring 1887 Detroit Wolverines!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe_G.
I purchased one of these T-shirts off eBay several weeks ago & was so pleased with it that I ordered a couple more.  The quality is better than these images show.  Very well done T-shirts!  (Also helps that he picked the best 19th century team!)

Joe Gonsowski
